testcase.name: WrongCredentialAuthentication
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object implements 'Server Layer Authentication'. SCTS sends SyncHdr with wrong credentials.

testcase.name: NoCredentialAutentication
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object implements 'Server Layer Authentication'. SCTS sends SyncHdr with no credentials.

testcase.name: AcceptCredential
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object accepts the credentials sent and proceeds with the Sync Session.

testcase.name: ResultsOnGet
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object responds with Results for a Get on device information.

testcase.name: AlertDatabase
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object responds with Alerts for all the databases alerted by SCTS.

testcase.name: ValidSyncTag
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object sends valid Sync Tags.

testcase.name: AlertMultipleDatabase
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object responds with Alerts for multiple databases alerted by SCTS.

testcase.name: TwoWaySync
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object's and SCTS' Sync Anchors match by sending/receiving Alerts for normal two way sync.

testcase.name: HandleAdds
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object handles Adds correctly.

testcase.name: ValidAdds
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object sends valid Adds.

testcase.name: ReplaceSCTSData
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object handles a Replace on a data item added by SCTS.

testcase.name: ReplaceSCTSData
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object sends a valid Replace on a data item added by SCTS.

testcase.name: DeleteSCTSData
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object handles a Delete on a data item added by SCTS.

testcase.name: SendDelete
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object sends a valid Delete on a data item added by SCTS.

testcase.name: ReplaceData
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object handles a Replace on a data item added by it.

testcase.name: SendReplace
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object sends a valid Replace on a data item added by it.

testcase.name: HandleDelete
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object handles a Delete on a data item added by it.

testcase.name: SendDelete
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object sends a valid Delete on a data item added by it.

testcase.name: ReplaceNoDataAdd
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object handles a Replace on a non-existant data item as an Add.

testcase.name: SlowSync
testcase.description: To check if the databases are in Sync by forcing a slow sync (SCTS does not send any modifications).

testcase.name: StatusDelete
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object responds with an appropriate status code for a Delete with a nonexistent target/source.

testcase.name: HandleSyn
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object handles sync without seperate intialization.

testcase.name: AddMultipleItems
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object can handle an Add with multiple items.

testcase.name: ReplaceMultipleItems
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object can handle a Replace with multiple items.

testcase.name: DeleteMultipleItems
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object can handle a Delete with multiple items.

testcase.name: ReplaceStatus
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object responds with individual 'Status' for each item in a Replace (One item is non-existant).

testcase.name: DeleteStatus
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object responds with individual 'Status' for each item in a Delete (One item is non-existant).

testcase.name: MultipleMessages
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object can handle multiple messages.

testcase.name: DetermineDevInfo
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object determines from the DevInfo whether or not NumberOfChanges is supported, and if it sends proper NumberOfChanges information to SCTS.

testcase.name: DetermineDevInfo
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object determines from the DevInfo whether or not NumberOfChanges is supported, and if it sends proper NumberOfChanges information to SCTS.

testcase.name: MaxObjSize_LargeObjects
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object determines from the DevInfo whether or not Large Objects are supported, and if it properly declares the MaxObjSize and can properly receive Large Objects.

testcase.name: SupportLargeObjects
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object determines from the DevInfo whether or not Large Objects are supported.

testcase.name: MaxObjSize_LargeObjects
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object determines from the DevInfo whether or not Large Objects are supported, and if it properly declares the MaxObjSize and can properly send Large Objects.

testcase.name: HandleIncorrectLargeObjects
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object correctly handles Large Objects with incorrect size.

testcase.name: NoCommit
testcase.description: To check if the Test Object did not commit the Large Object with incorrect size and the incomplete Large Object sent in the last session.
